name: Xfinity Military Program
description: Free mobile line 24 months + streaming discounts + $180 gift card
fullDescription: Xfinity offers exclusive benefits for military members, veterans, and first responders including free mobile service, streaming discounts, and Visa gift cards.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free Unlimited Xfinity Mobile line for 24 months (with Xfinity Internet)
- NOW TV included for 1 year (125+ live channels, Peacock Premium)
- Peacock Premium at $3.99/mo for 1 year (normally $7.99)
- $180 Visa Gift Card ($15/mo value for 1 year)
- Xfinity Rewards Diamond member status
- First responders also eligible
howToGetIt:
1. Visit military.xfinity.com or xfinity.com/military
2. Sign in with Xfinity ID
3. Verify military/first responder status through ID.me or SheerID
4. Eligible: active duty, Guard, Reserve, veterans, military families
5. First responders: police, firefighters, EMTs, paramedics
6. Benefits apply within 1-2 billing cycles
keywords: Xfinity, Comcast, military discount, veteran, first responder, internet, cable, TV, mobile, Peacock, ID.me
